secret.description: The core concept - confidential information being shared, not personal secrets
secret.notes: Emphasize the message/content being shared rather than personal secrets. See terminology/secret-concept.md for detailed guidance.

passphrase.description: Authentication for individual secrets (distinct from account passwords)
passphrase.notes: Must distinguish from account passwords. See terminology/password-passphrase.md

password.description: Account login credentials (distinct from secret passphrases)
password.notes: For account authentication only, not secret protection

burn.description: Permanently delete a secret before viewing

colonel.description: Administrator role (technical term specific to Onetime Secret)
colonel.notes: Translate as 'administrator' - the English term 'colonel' is project-specific and confusing

self-hosted.description: Running the software on your own infrastructure
self-hosted.notes: See reference/self-hosted-terms.md for regional preferences and context
